export.skill: id: do_posture version: 1.0.0 description: | Execute NAO robot posture changes (Stand, Sit, Crouch, StandInit). interface: action default_interface_path: /skill/do_posture datatype: nao_skills/action/DoPosture functional_domains: - motions parameters: in: - name: posture_name type: string required: true description: | Target posture name accepted by the posture implementation (for example: Stand, Sit, Crouch, StandInit). - name: speed type: float default: 0.8 max: 1.0 description: Posture transition speed in [0.0, 1.0]. out: - name: success type: boolean description: True if posture request completed successfully. - name: message type: string description: Execution result message. - name: duration type: float description: Execution duration in seconds. feedback: - name: status type: string description: Execution phase (for example preparing/executing/completing). - name: progress type: float description: Progress value in [0.0, 1.0].
